## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c7d9d21d7a9f1bb2a715b2b67620e023fa08990ecc9ad86afacc2335473434ef)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'cp2-shared-components' @ 998.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
